entry.title: PZ20 Release
entry.content: The prediction results of Puzzle 20 has been release now!

entry.title: Unknown Rfam Puzzles First Round Prediction Release
entry.content:
The first round of the “Unknown Rfam Puzzles” has been released now within the RNA-Puzzles community. Further prediction submissions are still very welcome. We would like to encourage experimentalists to help validate some of the good predictions.

A detailed time table for the “Unknown Rfam Puzzles” is available through google doc.

entry.title: Unknown Rfam Puzzles First Round Closed
entry.content:
The first round of the “Unknown Rfam Puzzles” has been closed now. The prediction results will be released soon (the release will be within RNA-Puzzles community). Further prediction submissions are still very welcome. We would like to encourage experimentalists to help validate some of the good predictions.

A detailed time table for the “Unknown Rfam Puzzles” is available through google doc.

entry.title: New Domain Name
entry.content:
RNA-Puzzles has a new domain name rnapuzzles.org. This domain name will always point to the RNA-Puzzles website no matter where we set the domain. Currently, the website is fully functional except the registration system. Therefore, the submission of the prediction results need to be done by email.

Please feel free to contact Chichau if you have any question about RNA-Puzzles.

entry.title: New RNA-Puzzles Website at Github
entry.content:
Considering the unstability of the old RNA-Puzzles web server (ahsoka), a new low-level RNA-Puzzzles website has been release at github. Alternatively, the website can be accessed by rnapuzzles.tk.

Further, we have released the results of Puzzle 21, the Guanidine III Riboswitch.

Best Wishes!

Chichau

entry.title: Puzzle 39
entry.content:
Sequence (5' to 3'):

GGUAAAACAGCCUGUGGGUGAAACACA CCCACAGGGCCCAUUGGGCGCUAGCAC UCUGGUAUCACGGUACCUUUGUGCGCC UGUUUUACC

Puzzle: B3 cloverleaf RRE

Crystal structure kindly provided by: Deepak Koirala

Reference: Crystal structure of a highly conserved enteroviral 5' cloverleaf RNA replication element. Nat Commun 14: 1955-1955. (2023)

PDB id: 8dp3

raw prediction | Assessment results

tRNA:
